div1.p: United States District Court for the Western District of Washington.
In matter application of D.A. Hatfield for Writ of Habeas Corpus } No. 2082 Appearance.

To the Clerk of the above Entilted Court: You will please enter our appearance as attorneys for Respondent Robert T. Hodge, Sheriff in the above entitled cause; and service of all subsequent papers, except writs and process, may be made upon said respondent, by leaving the same with
div1.ab: John F. Murphy Hugh W. Caldwell
div1.p: Notice: - Attorneys will please endorse their own Filings. Rule II.
United States District Court Western District of Washington
In matter Petition of D.A. Hatfield for Writ of Habeas Corpus. 90B-3-135
Filed in the U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington: Feb 6 1912
div1.ab: by A. N. Engle clerk deputy
John F Murphy & Hugh W Caldwell For Respondent
